title: How to unsubscribe from Jakdojade Premium
description: You can cancel your Jakdojade Premium subscription at any time. Here's how to do it:

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via Mobile App
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Jakdojade Premium subscription, follow these steps:

*   Open the Jakdojade app on your device.
*   Go to the settings menu within the app.
*   Look for a section related to 'Subscription' or 'Premium Features'.
*   Tap on 'Manage Subscription'.
*   Select the option to cancel your subscription.
*   Confirm the cancellation when prompted.
*   Check your email for a confirmation message regarding the cancellation.

seo_text: Learn how to easily cancel your Jakdojade Premium subscription. Follow our step-by-step guide to manage your subscription and prevent future charges.
